```{R TASK1}
library(igraph)
library(tidyverse)

mySNAdata <- read.csv("/Users/luke/Documents/HUDK4050/ACA4/ACA4_Data.csv", row.names = 1)

mynet <- graph_from_adjacency_matrix(as.matrix(mySNAdata), weighted=TRUE, mode="undirected")

plot(mynet) 

vcount(mynet)


ecount(mynet)

#number of edges is 38 and nodes are 10


edge_density(mynet)
#density is 0.84


diameter(mynet)
#diameter is 2

degree(mynet)
#degree centrality shows above

betweenness(mynet, directed = FALSE, normalized = TRUE)
#luke and kx have higher influence

fc <- cluster_fast_greedy(mynet)
membership(fc)

sizes(fc)
#community 1 has 7 actors and community 2 has 3 actors


V(mynet)$color <- fc$membership
plot(mynet)


```
